Material.Name: material
Material.Components: fur or a feather from a beast

Spell.Name: Enhance Ability
Spell.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends.

Description.Name: Bear’s Endurance
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Constitution checks. It also gains 2d6 temporary hit points, which are lost when the spell ends.

Description.Name: Bull’s Strength
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Strength checks, and his or her carrying capacity doubles.

Description.Name: Cat’s Grace
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Dexterity checks. It also doesn’t take damage from falling 20 feet or less if it isn’t incapacitated.

Description.Name: Eagle’s Splendor
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Charisma checks.

Description.Name: Fox’s Cunning
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Intelligence checks.

Description.Name: Owl’s Wisdom
Description.Text: The target has advantage on Wisdom checks.

Description.Name: At Higher Levels
Description.Text: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.
